languages.text: "Гхрм... Ценю это. Ладно, если твое слово чего-то стоит, то, может быть, ты и не такой гаденыш, как мне показалось сначала".
"Hmph... I appreciate that. All right, if your word is worth anything, then perhaps you are not as much of a weasel as I first thought."
languages.original_text: "Гхрм... Ценю это. Ладно, если твое слово чего-то стоит, то, может быть, ты и не такой гаденыш, как мне показалось сначала".

traits.locale_text: "Hmph... I appreciate that. All right, if your word is worth anything, then perhaps you are not as much of a weasel as I first thought."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: “嗯……我很感激。好吧，如果你的话是真的，那或许你并不像我一开始想得那么奸诈。”
languages.original_text: "Hmph... I appreciate that. All right, if your word is worth anything, then perhaps you are not as much of a weasel as I first thought."

traits.locale_text: “嗯……我很感激。好吧，如果你的话是真的，那或许你并不像我一开始想得那么奸诈。”
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: « Hmph... J'apprécie le geste. Je vous prenais pour une raclure, mais j'avais peut-être tort, finalement. Si vous êtes capable de tenir parole, bien sûr. »
languages.original_text: "Hmph... I appreciate that. All right, if your word is worth anything, then perhaps you are not as much of a weasel as I first thought."

traits.locale_text: « Hmph... J'apprécie le geste. Je vous prenais pour une raclure, mais j'avais peut-être tort, finalement. Si vous êtes capable de tenir parole, bien sûr. »
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: «Mmm... Lo agradezco. Bueno, si tu palabra vale algo, entonces tal vez no seas un ser tan rastrero como pensaba».
languages.original_text: "Hmph... I appreciate that. All right, if your word is worth anything, then perhaps you are not as much of a weasel as I first thought."

traits.locale_text: «Mmm... Lo agradezco. Bueno, si tu palabra vale algo, entonces tal vez no seas un ser tan rastrero como pensaba».
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: 「ふん…感謝するよ。お前さんの言葉に価値があるのなら、俺が最初に思ったほどずるい奴ではないんだろうな」
languages.original_text: "Hmph... I appreciate that. All right, if your word is worth anything, then perhaps you are not as much of a weasel as I first thought."

traits.locale_text: 「ふん…感謝するよ。お前さんの言葉に価値があるのなら、俺が最初に思ったほどずるい奴ではないんだろうな」
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: "Hmpf ... Danke. Also gut, wenn Euer Wort etwas wert ist, dann seid Ihr vielleicht doch nicht so ein Wiesel, wie ich es anfangs glaubte."
languages.original_text: "Hmph... I appreciate that. All right, if your word is worth anything, then perhaps you are not as much of a weasel as I first thought."

traits.locale_text: "Hmpf ... Danke. Also gut, wenn Euer Wort etwas wert ist, dann seid Ihr vielleicht doch nicht so ein Wiesel, wie ich es anfangs glaubte."

languages.original_text: "Hmph... I appreciate that. All right, if your word is worth anything, then perhaps you are not as much of a weasel as I first thought."

languages.text: "Hımm... Sağ olasın. Sözlerinin değeri varsa belki de ilk zamanlar sandığım kadar sinsi değilsindir."
languages.original_text: "Hmph... I appreciate that. All right, if your word is worth anything, then perhaps you are not as much of a weasel as I first thought."

traits.locale_text: "Hıh... Sağ olasın. Pekâlâ, sözlerinin bir değeri varsa belki de ilk zamanlar sandığım kadar sinsi değilsindir."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion
